ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and he hears the words, 'Who can heal him now?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And it is asked: "Is there any reciter of charms and amulets?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and it is said: “Is there any enchanter who can step forward and help (by his chanting)?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the angels say, "Who will take away his soul,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they will say, “Is there any one – any magician?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it will be said: "Who can cure him"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And it is said: Who will be a magician?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and it is said, 'Who is an enchanter?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And men say: Where is the wizard (who can save him now)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when it is asked: "Could any magician save him now?";
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it is cried. who can charm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and it is said, ‘Who will take him up?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And there will be a cry, "Who is a magician (to restore him)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it will be said: "Who can cure him and save him from death?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and it is said: 'Who is a healing chanter'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is said, “Who is the healer?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:27] and it is said, [and] those around him [the dying one] say: ‘Where is the enchanter?’, to perform incantations on him and cure him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And men say) and those around it among his family and others say: (Where is the wizard (who can save him now)?) Is there any physician who can cure him? It is also said this means: the angels say to one another: who will rise with his soul to Allah?
